verbs.description: imposthumate (third-person singular simple present imposthumates, present participle imposthumating, simple past and past participle imposthumated)

entries.meaning: To apostemate; to form an imposthume or abscess.
examples: [T]he Measles & Hooping Cough left the Lungs tender ten Years ago—& at this critical Time of Life they may imposthumate.
